foodData.foodDes: Chocolate cake or chocolate g√¢teau is a cake flavored with melted chocolate, cocoa powder, or both.
Dosa is a popular South Indian thin crepe made with fermented rice and lentil batter.
Idli is a steamed food, made with with a fermented batter of rice, urad dal and fenugreek seeds. White and fluffy, it is a delight to bite into.
Porridge is a thick soup made of boiled oats, rice, or other grains typically flavored with sugar, honey, or other sweet, warming spices.
Consists of Idli, Dosa, Vada, Sambar, Chutney, Upma, Poori, Pongal, Bisi Bele Bath, Appam, Idiyappam, etc.
Milkshake is a sweet beverage made by blending milk, ice cream, and flavorings or sweeteners such as butterscotch, chocolate syrup, etc.
Mojito is one of the world's most popular cocktails. It's a simple mixed drink of mint, lime, sugar, and club soda, and a muddler.
Made purely from the extraction of the natural liquid contained in fruits and served readily.
Waffles are made from leavened batter or dough that is cooked between two plates that are patterned to give a characteristic size, shape, and surface impression.
Potato chips (often just chips), or crisps are thin slices of potato that have been either deep fried or baked until crunchy.
Cookies are baked or cooked snacks or desserts that are typically small, flat and sweet. Often preferred to serve with beverages and milk.
Chocolate is manufactured from cacao beans. It is a common ingredient in ice cream, pudding, cakes, confectionery, and Easter eggs, among other delicacies.
Jalebi is a spiral shaped crisp & juicy sweet made with all-purpose flour, gram flour and sugar syrup.
